entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 a.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
